price: Dia mengeluarkan yang hidup dari yang mati dan mengeluarkan yang mati dari yang hidup dan menghidupkan bumi sesudah matinya. Dan seperti itulah kamu akan dikeluarkan (dari kubur).
arabic: يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَيُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّ وَيُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yukh'riju al-ḥaya mina al-mayiti wayukh'riju al-mayita mina al-ḥayi wayuḥ'yī al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā wakadhālika tukh'rajūna
